title: How to Make Saucepan Stuffing

steps.headline: Add the celery, onion, parsley, chicken bouillon, poultry seasoning and pepper to a small mixing bowl.
Add seasoning mixture to a saucepan.
Add the butter and water to the seasoning mixture.
Cook over low heat 1 to 2 minutes, or until most of the liquid is absorbed.
Cover and remove from heat.
steps.description: Let stand a few minutes before serving.

text: Add the celery, onion, parsley, chicken bouillon, poultry seasoning and pepper to a small mixing bowl.  Mix to combine.  Add seasoning mixture to a saucepan.  Add the butter and water to the seasoning mixture.  Mix to combine.  Simmer mixture 5 minutes.  Add the dried bread cubes.  Cook over low heat 1 to 2 minutes, or until most of the liquid is absorbed.  Cover and remove from heat. Let stand a few minutes before serving. Finished.
